summary: AN ORDINANCE further modifying the modified urban renewal plan for the University Addition-Northlake urban renewal project (No. Wash. R-8), approved by Ordinance 100740, by adopting the "Land Use and Thoroughfares Plan" as revised September 18, 1974 (Exhibit A in C.F. 278978) and superseding the existing urban renewal plan approved by Ordinance 100740 to the extent inconsistent.
